Class LibraryManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--LibraryManager
public class LibraryManager
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a Graphical User Interface for managing MP3 library files.

Version:
Version 3d - December, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery

Constructor Summary
LibraryManager()
          Initialize the user interface for a new LibraryManager application.
 
Method Summary
 void doOpen()
          Interacts with the user to open an existing MP3 Library.
 MP3_Library getLibrary()
          Returns a reference to the MP3_Library for this manager, or null if there is none.
static boolean isOpen(java.io.File file)
          Tells whether a File is currently open by any LibraryManager instance.
static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
          Creates the first LibraryManager object.
 void newLib()
          Interacts with the user to create a new MP3 Library file and open it as the current file.

isOpen

public static boolean isOpen(java.io.File file)
Tells whether a File is currently open by any LibraryManager instance.
Parameters:
file - The File object to be checked.
Returns:
true if a LibraryManager instance has the file open.
